Environmental Services

email address herephone number heresms phone number herefax number hereminicom number here

Our team of engineers, drillers and technicians provide a range of services including feasibility studies, desk studies, geotechnical site investigations, site and laboratory testing and contaminated land studies

We can give interpretation of results and recommendations on a variety of projects. These include slope stability assessment, foundation design for buildings and other structures, mining subsidence problems, material acceptability, road pavement design and contamination problems.
